Class Connectable

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.PetriNetElement
      • model.Connectable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Place, Transition

    public abstract class Connectable
extends PetriNetElement
    Connectable PetriNet Elements (Transition/Place)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> arc_ids
      Collection of all arc_ids of arcs that have this Connectable as source or target
      java.lang.String label
      the label text of this Connectable
      static java.lang.String NO_LABEL_IDENTIFIER
      if the label of a Connectable is identical to this String, no label will be shown or saved.

      whenever the position of a connectable is set the related Figure's updatePosition() method gets called, so that eventually the Label's positon will be updated too.
